1. ABC News ‘entirely gutted’ ‘GMA3,’ fired executive producer as part of layoffs: ‘People are crying and upset’  New York Post
  2. Disney cuts 6% of staffers from news and entertainment unit, shutters data-driven website 538  Yahoo Finance
  3. Political poll news site 538 to close amid larger shuttering across ABC and Disney  The Guardian US
  4. Disney to cut nearly 6% staff across two units, source says  Reuters
  5. ABC News boss 'read from script' as he laid off FiveThirtyEight workers  New York Post

item.title: Stocks tumble as fallout from Trump tariffs roils markets - ABC News
item.description:
1. Stocks tumble as fallout from Trump tariffs roils markets  ABC News
  2. Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq fall as Trump announces more tariff exemptions from Mexico  Yahoo Finance UK
  3. US stocks slide as tariff uncertainty persists  CNN
  4. Dow falls 300 points despite more tariff exemptions as investors seek trade fight clarity: Live updates  CNBC
  5. Stock market today: Wall Street resumes its tumble as Dow drops 500  The Associated Press
